alert.note: Alert for Oak Creek and Sycamore Canyons (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 1:27PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Yavapai County through 215 PM MST... At 126 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Yavapai County Fairgrounds, or 10 miles east of Chino Valley, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph, up to half inch hail, and heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clarkdale, Verde Village, Bridgeport, Cottonwood, Cornville, Jerome, Dead Horse Ranch State Park, Playground Group Campground, Potato Patch Campground and Tuzigoot National Monument. This includes the following highways... State Route 260 between mile markers 207 and 208. State Route 89A between mile markers 335 and 363. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
